Articles.Content:
Hi, I can't seem to get the BDarmory cont. mod working for 1.3.1. I am getting a text line saying that there are patches being applied, but I can't see any weapons in the SPH or VAB. It is installed correctly, other mods have worked for me when installed this way. Also, I downloaded from spacedock. Should I try the version off of curse? Is there another depndency mod? PLEASE HELP ME!!!!!! (Also, launching with steam)

Edited October 9, 2017 by HeroBrian_333

26 minutes ago, HeroBrian_333 said:

Hi, I can't seem to get the BD armory cont. mod working for 1.3.1. I am getting a text line saying that there are patches being applied, but I can't see any weapons in the SPH or VAB. It is installed correctly, other mods have worked for me when installed this way. Also, I downloaded from spacedock. Should I try the version off of curse? Is there another depndency mod? PLEASE HELP ME!!!!!! (Also, launching with steam)

Hi there is currently no release version BD Armory for KSP 1.3.1  all current releases are available here https://github.com/PapaJoesSoup/BDArmory/releases

Edited October 9, 2017 by SpannerMonkey(smce)
Okay, how do I revert to 1.3.0?
There is now a 1.3.1 BDA beta release available from the link I provided earlier
